info.title: OData Service for namespace ODataDemo
info.description:
This OData service is located at http://localhost/service-root/

## Entity Data Model
![ER Diagram](http://yuml.me/diagram/class/[Product],[Product]-0..1>[Category],[Product]-0..1>[Supplier],[Category],[Category]-*>[Product],[Supplier],[Supplier]-*>[Product],[Country])

## References
- [Org.OData.Core.V1](http://localhost/swagger-ui/?url=http://localhost/examples/Org.OData.Core.V1.openapi.json)
- [Org.OData.Measures.V1](http://localhost/swagger-ui/?url=http://localhost/examples/Org.OData.Measures.V1.openapi.json)
